title: Oyako de Manabu: Kaiji no Youjin - Jishin no Youjin
original_name: 親子で学ぶ 火事の用心 地震の用心
sinopse: An educational fire safety and earthquake safety short starring the cast of Oyako Club. The film was meant to be shown for parents and children together so that they may devise strategies as a family.
